mapper.select: select r.main_file_id,r.relation_file_id,r.relation_create_time,f.file_name "relationFile.fileName",f.file_id "relationFile.fileId",f.file_path "relationFile.filePath",f.file_uuid "relationFile.fileUuid" from relation_info r left join file_info f on r.relation_file_id = f.file_id where r.main_file_id=#{mainFileId}
